name: Healthyfied Ground Beef Caldereta
description: This Healthyfied Ground Beef Caldereta is a delicious twist on a classic Filipino dish, focusing on high-protein and low-carb ingredients to fit into a healthy lifestyle. Perfect for those who love to enjoy traditional flavors without compromising their dietary goals.
recipeIngredient: 0.25  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare all the vegetables first: mince the 6 cloves of garlic and dice the 83 grams of red onion and 120 grams of red bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, brown the 380 grams of ground beef over medium heat for about 8 minutes or until fully cooked. Drain excess fat if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the minced garlic and diced onion to the pan with beef. Cook for another 3 minutes or until the onion is translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Introduce the 0.25 cup of tomato purée along with the diced red bell pepper to the pan. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the 3 teaspoons of sweet pickle chips and add them to the pan. Season with 0.25 tsp of salt and 0.25 tsp of ground black pepper. Mix everything thoroughly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture simmer on low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to meld the flavors together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
